TopicTitle: [Or Mods]Hermel Moon Base Craft Submission (Inspired by Harv's THATS NO MOON! Base!)

Articles.Content:
I saw his thread,and decided to make my own!

So heres how this works: You make a craft using the objective at the bottom highlighted in blue.

Ill decide which is the best then add the craft!

So lets begin!

SUCCESSFUL SUBMISSIONS:

None yet.

Objective:

I need a land unmanned rover to pick the base site.

Mods: Stock

By [Or Mods] I mean ill specify a mod name above.
